page.title: 06Family Sunday
page.content: Phillip Keightley age 8 Sunday started with a punch in the eye from my two year old brother. Then my brother was throwing Weetabix at me, so that's what I had for breakfast. Then I decided to go out to play with my friend James for the day. We had a great time on his computer game.It was called Harrier Attack.I helped his family by looking after their dog Misty, a lovely golden yellow labrador. For dinner we had roast pork and roast potatoes.Their dad was putting the sails up on his boat.After he had done that we went sailing at a sailing club.Their mum was at home looking after the dog and playing the piano.
